item.title: Sample Markdown Code
item.description: below is a code sample test 1 - Black and White # test powershell script no highlights Write-host "Hello World"; $service = Get-Service $service | select Name below is a code sample test 2 - using highlight # test powershell script Write-host "Hello World"; $process = Get-Process $process | select Name Powershell script display 3 - Powershell markdown <# comment block #> function test { return 99; } $x = 1 # Comment Write-host "This is a test $var" $string = "This is a test" $servie = Get-Service $service | format-table -autosize
